document_data.name: Eldryn Lammaraster
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Eldryn Lammaraster''', a [[Zulkir]] of [[Abjuration]] sometime ''circa'' late [[1300 DR]].
document_data.Description: Eldryn was an old [[human]] Thayan man. He was bitter and paranoid. He was afraid of being back-stabbed by his many wanna-be successors. He was said to be more prepared for an attack and betrayal than a [[beholder]].
document_data.Possessions: The Zulkir of Abjuration layered his [[robe]]s with many woven defensive magics. Eldryn's specialization were automatically-triggered ''[[counterspell]]s'', many of which were unique [[spell]]s developed by the bitter old man, and their secret formulae were taken to the grave with Eldryn's death.
document_data.History: Eldryn Lammaraster took the position of the Zullkir of Abjuration sometime before the late {{YearlinkName|1300}}. His name was among several zulkir names that became widely known after being named and described in the [[book]] called ''[[Twelve Winters Under the Lash]]'', penned by an anonymous slave and smuggled out of Thay sometime in late 1300 DR.
